title: Sea-View Croatia Escape with Infinity Pool & Seven Restaurants & Bars
description: The unforgettable Adriatic awaits with a breathtaking stay at Croatia’s D-Resort Šibenik, set next to the city's spectacular yacht marina. Designed by famed architect Nikola Bašić, known for Zadar's 'Sea Organ’ installation, this unique hotel gives the feeling of being aboard a large, modern ship, with all rooms enjoying sweeping views across the medieval port. With an infinity pool, multiple restaurants and bars, a kids club and a wellness centre - this resort is a secret you'll want to keep to yourself.
